snippet: A Democratic official in Kentucky said two members of Progress Kentucky had told him of secretly recording a meeting at Senator Mitch McConnell’s re-election headquarters.
abstract: Secret recording of meeting at Sen Mitch McConnell's re-election headquarters is linked to political action committee Progress Kentucky.
lead_paragraph: A Democratic official in Kentucky said two members of Progress Kentucky had told him of secretly recording a meeting at Senator Mitch McConnell’s re-election headquarters.

headline.seo: Leaked Recording of Mitch McConnell About Ashley Judd Is Linked to PAC
headline.main: McConnell Recording Is Linked to a PAC
headline.print_headline: McConnell Recording Is Linked To a PAC
